description: Looking for a delicious air-fryer recipe? Try these juicy corn on the cob wedges with feta and spicy sriracha sour cream for a scrumptious side or starter.
name: Air-fryer Corn Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sour cream in a small bowl. Add sriracha sauce and swirl to combine. Place corn on a serving plate and sprinkle with feta and coriander. Serve with spicy sour cream.
